vehicles.description: Several cars were parked on the right side of the road.
vehicles.explanation: Your vehicle should maintain a safe distance from these parked cars to avoid any accidents caused by sudden opening of car doors or pedestrians suddenly appearing between vehicles.

other objects.description: There is a trash bin on the right side of the road, and next to it is a streetlight pole.
other objects.explanation: Vehicles should remain vigilant as these environments are visually complex and cluttered, where pedestrians might appear unexpectedly.

general_perception.description and explanation: The image contains a few notable features affecting the driving conditions. On the right side of the road, several cars are parked. The presence of parked cars necessitates that your vehicle maintains a safe distance to prevent any mishaps that could occur if car doors are suddenly opened or pedestrians emerge from between the parked vehicles unexpectedly. Additionally, there is a trash bin situated on the right side of the road, close to a streetlight pole. The proximity of these objects to the roadway adds to the visual complexity of the environment, requiring vehicles to proceed with caution on the chance that pedestrians might step out from behind these obstructions without warning. There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, or barriers present in the image.

driving_suggestion: Due to low visibility and slippery roads, please drive cautiously and reduce speed. Maintain a safe distance from parked vehicles and stay alert in case they or pedestrians suddenly move. Obey lane markings and avoid crossing the central divider. This vehicle should keep a safe following distance from the vehicle ahead, pay attention to their brake lights, and adjust speed or stop if necessary. Considering the slippery roads, increase the braking distance and slow down to prevent skidding. Drivers should also be aware of trash bins and lamp posts along the road to avoid unexpected obstacles.

1.description and explanation: A dustbin located by the side of the road, typically used for waste disposal. The presence of this dustbin indicates that it is a designated area for trash collection. The ego car should maintain a safe distance from the curb to avoid any potential obstructions that might be around the dustbin such as trash bags or debris that could spill onto the roadway, consequently affecting the drivability and safety.

2.description and explanation: A car parked by the side of the street, identifiable by its shape and the reflection of light on its body. This car is not in motion and should be regarded as a stationary object. The ego car must be prepared to respond to other vehicles potentially pulling out from the parking space without notice or pedestrians that might be obscured by the parked car when they are crossing the street.
